thread.title: Nigeria: NEC in Session, NNPC Probe Committee Expected to Brief
thread.title_full: Nigeria: NEC in Session, NNPC Probe Committee Expected to Brief

title: Nigeria: NEC in Session, NNPC Probe Committee Expected to Brief
text:
Africa: Continent Is Stronger When United - Mugabe 
The committee is expected to brief council on their findings during the meeting. 
Some governors at the meeting include: Cross River, Kaduna, Rivers, Akwa Ibom, Enugu, Anambra, Deputy Governor of Imo and Kogi, Gombe, Delta, Kano, Lagos, Niger, Adamawa, Ondo Sokoto, Yobe, Osun, Bauchi, Ebonyi, Kebbi, Oyo- Deputy, Plateau, Taraba, Zamfara, Bayelsa. Nigeria
